name: Baykus35 for Android
tagline: A simple tariff query application for Izmir citizens
body:
### It's too late to go home? It's too late to go home and you don't wanna pay tons of money for taxi right? What a chance that you are not hopeless!!! ![Baykus35 - Android](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61171723/Image/Theresanappforthat.jpg) *** ### 5 Different Routes There are 5 different routes that night buses operate on. * Bornova - Konak * Buca - Konak * Gaziemir - Konak * Balçova - Konak * Çiğli - Konak *** ### Author This tiny project is authored and maintained by Berat Onur Ersen (@onurersen) as a part of free time activity.It includes ListView,Fragments,Location,Maps V2 examples. *** ### Support or Contact For your any proposals and suggestions even your complains please don't hesitate to get in touch.You can contact using baykusotuzbes@gmail.com email address. ***
